name: waterdataui-assets
description: Compiled static assets for Water Data For The Nation

scripts.build: npm run clean && run-p build:* && npm run hash-assets
scripts.build:css:main: node-sass --include-path node_modules/leaflet/dist --include-path node_modules/wdfn-viz/src/stylesheets --include-path node_modules/uswds/src/stylesheets src/styles/main.scss dist/main.css && uglifycss --output dist/main.css dist/main.css && postcss dist/main.css --no-map --use autoprefixer -o dist/main.css
scripts.build:css:graph: node-sass --include-path node_modules/wdfn-viz/src/stylesheets --include-path node_modules/uswds/src/stylesheets src/styles/graph.scss dist/graph.css && uglifycss --output dist/graph.css dist/graph.css && postcss dist/graph.css --no-map --use autoprefixer -o dist/graph.css
scripts.build:fonts: mkdir -p dist/fonts && cp -r node_modules/uswds/src/fonts/* dist/fonts && cp node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts/* dist/fonts
scripts.build:images: mkdir -p dist/img && mkdir -p dist/images && cp -r node_modules/uswds/src/img/* dist/img && cp -r node_modules/wdfn-viz/src/img/* dist/img && cp -r node_modules/leaflet/dist/images/* dist/images && cp -r src/img/* dist/img
scripts.build:js: rollup -c --environment NODE_ENV:production && mkdir -p dist/scripts && cp node_modules/date-time-format-timezone/build/browserified/date-time-format-timezone-complete-min.js dist/scripts

author: USGS
